column1: Little Goat Diner////Well-what can I say: Stephanie Izard did it again. Fantastic!! The atmosphere is calming and welcoming
column2: the food is SUPER flavorful and well seasoned (sexy plating)
column3: the staff is fun and friendly
column5: and the drinks are killer. Yes-it's busy and a long wait but the text/website showing your place in line makes it a smoother and the bar/bakery/coffee/souvenir area helps to kill time. I also love going to a place for lunch and leaving thinking
column7: I gotta come back and try more". Cheers! We WILL be back. Stephanie ROCKS! See for yourself.
